thread.section_title: Naked Wines Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Naked Wines | nakedwines.com.au
thread.title: Shannon McPharlin
thread.title_full: Naked Wines reviewed by Shannon McPharlin

author: Shannon McPharlin
title: Shannon McPharlin
text: To be honest I can't understand why some people are so negative towards Wine Angels. Its not hard to read emails that tell you how the club works the club is very open and honest about the way their membership is structured and I for one thing love how it works!! I love being an angel for a small amount every month I can help up and coming wine makers get their product out there.. Whilst there has been a couple wines I haven't liked that much, I have some really awesome favourites, Keep up the good work team from a very loyal Angel!!! xxxx
